posts.name: Cafe Bourbon Street
posts.note: Cafe Bourbon Street is an alternative, and independent music acts perform at this intimate, laid-back bar with an edgy vibe. At this punk bar, you need to order the perogies.

posts.name: Fox in the Snow Cafe
posts.note: Fox in the Snow Cafe is an airy coffee shop featuring java drinks, baked goods, tarts, and biscuits in a modernized garage space. You can't go wrong ordering the cinnamon rolls with it's, and delicious frosting or the chocolate filled donuts or the bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich with a bit of spicy mustard/horseradish mayo. I would have liked to get there blueberry scone or seasonal peach Galette/tart.

posts.name: Graeter's Ice Cream
posts.note: Graeter's Ice Cream is a longtime ice cream parlor chain serving small-batch scoops plus baked goods at some locations. They have some of the best ice cream in the country no matter which flavor you try. NOTE: They have multiple locations.

posts.name: Hot Chicken Takeover
posts.note: Hot Chicken Takeover serves spicy Nashville-style fried chicken and Southern sides in a barn like space with counter service. The mac and cheese was good, but I liked their Cole Slaw better. So see if you can get two orders of the Cole Slaw instead of one of each with your meal. Watch a video about Hot Chicken Takeover's mission of employing former prisoners. NOTE: They are open daily from 11:00 AM - 3:00 PM at this location and have multiple other locations open extended hours.

posts.name: Katzinger's Delicatessen
posts.note: Katzinger's Delicatessen is a long-running joint serving up deli classics, including Reuben's, smoked fish, and matzo ball soup. NOTE: They have multiple locations.

posts.name: Loops
posts.note: Loops serve hot dogs, gyros, sandwiches, and this casual restaurant offers other simple eats. Order the Italian beef with spicy peppers sandwich.

posts.name: Mission Coffee Co.
posts.note: Mission Coffee Co. is a brick-walled coffeehouse brewing specialty beans in an industrial setting with handcrafted tables. The loose leaf oolong tea uses fresh herbs/leaves. Charming little place of the main drag of North High St. to relax and get some work done at some communal tables along with some comfy chairs to sit and read for a bit.

posts.name: Momo Ghar
posts.note: Momo Ghar is family owned and operated. The popular Himalayan dumpling restaurant began in Saraga International Market. Momo Ghar is well known for their MOMOs which are Himalayan dumplings filled with meat and/or vegetables. Order the Chicken Chhoila Set which is marinated chicken with chickpeas and rice. Or the Kothey which are Tibetan-style dumplings.

posts.name: North Market
posts.note: The North Market is a public market located in Downtown Columbus. Four of the places listed as part of my Columbus, OH list are in this market such as Hot Chicken Takeout, Momo Ghar Market, Pistacia Vera, and Katzinger's Deli.

posts.name: One Line Coffee - Short North
posts.note: The One Line Coffee Short North location is a brick-accented coffee bar offering house-roasted beans, local pastries, and weekend brewing workshops. They have a great selection of coffees and some teas too. In the back, there are five or six small tables to get some work done and even a couple of comfy chairs to sit and read a bit. NOTE: They have more than one location.

posts.name: Pistacia Vera
posts.note: Pistacia Vera is a quaint cafe with sidewalk seats for homemade macaroon, pastries, and other sweets, plus light fare. You need to try their rye croissant and the tomato Galette along with a hot chocolate that they add a small home-made marshmallow too. NOTE: They have multiple locations.

posts.name: Ray Ray's Hog Pit
posts.note: Ray Ray's Hog Pit meats are hardwood-smoked and served from the window of this year-round food truck open late-week. You need to order the pork burger.

posts.name: Schmidt's Sausage Shop
posts.note: Schmidt's Sausage Shop has an all-you-can-eat sausage buffet which typically has four different types of sausage and a few sides of veggies. Most importantly don't forget to order the enormous chocolate filled cream puffs for dessert.

posts.name: Sweet Carrot
posts.note: Sweet Carrot is a counter-serve spot with a rabbit motif serving BBQ and other American comfort foods, along with beer and wine. You should order the Ohio Chicken Meatball Sandwich or the Corn Cake with Brisket.

posts.name: Thurman Cafe
posts.note: Thurman Cafe is a bustling, rustic American haunt with oversized, toppings-loaded burgers and a full bar. You need to order the 'The Thurman Burger' which contains the following: overloaded with ham, sautéed mushrooms and onions, mozzarella and American cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickle, banana peppers, and mayo with chips and a pickle spear. Plus, you need a side of their French fries. If you're super hungry get 'The Thurmanator' which is the same as the 'The Thurman Burger' but has not one but two three-quarters of a pound burger patties.
